abstract: Ken Johnson reviews solo exhibit of mixed-media works by artist Matthew Weinstein at Sonnabend gallery.
snippet: Matthew Weinstein’s video “The Childhood of Bertolt Brecht” at Sonnabend offers up a strange new world.
lead_paragraph: Matthew Weinstein’s video “The Childhood of Bertolt Brecht” at Sonnabend offers up a strange new world.

headline.main: Matthew Weinstein: ‘The Childhood of Bertolt Brecht’
headline.print_headline: Matthew Weinstein: ‘The Childhood of Bertolt Brecht’
